channel.title: Pi help plz
channel.description: Okay guys listen carefully or this will make no since to you whatsoever... ____ I want to make a non-degradable item, wear away within a certain about of time (about 10 minutes).. But then! Within 15 minutes of you not having that item wielded, your character gets (poisoned) until they wield the item once again. Is this possible? If so, How?

item.title: Pi help plz
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

Okay guys listen carefully or this will make no since to you whatsoever…

I want to make a non-degradable item, wear away within a certain about of time (about 10 minutes)…
But then! Within 15 minutes of you not having that item wielded, your character gets (poisoned) until they wield the item once again.
Is this possible? If so, How?

Read full topic
